message: I propose a fair division, considering our future rounds. Let's start with a 90/10 split. I'm sure we can find a more agreeable compromise in later rounds.
I propose a 95/5 split.  I'm willing to be generous now, but  the money will be worth less each round.  Let's work together to ensure we both get something.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40 this time.  We both get a decent share and can avoid further losses due to inflation.
I'm feeling generous this round! Let's go with a 70/30 split. This will give you a decent share, and I'm still able to maximize what I get after the inflation takes its bite.
